text:
By default (using .msi installer) in the C:Program Files\Apache Software
Foundation\Apache2.2\conf\extra\httpd-ssl.conf are added pathts to diferent
locations like SSLSessionCache, ErrorLog...

But if i use the configuration what apaches .msi made:

ErrorLog C:/Program Files/Apache Software Foundation/Apache2.2/logs/error_log

I get an error message:

"Syntax error on line 81 of C:/Program Files/Apache Software Foundation/Apache2.2
/conf/extra/httpd-ssl.conf:
ErrorLog takes one argument, The filename of the error log
Note the errors or messages above, and press the <ESC> key to exit.  15..."

Because the path should look like this:

ErrorLog "C:/Program Files/Apache Software Foundation/Apache2.2/logs/error_log"

P.S. Sorry for my bad english :(
creator: eziitiss@gmail.com
